name: Little Room
description:
VISIT THE DEVELOPER'S WEBSITE

Overview

Little Room is a short, free, light-hearted story about decisions and dreams in life.

Not everyone knows where they want to be right away. It is normal for most people to struggle to know where they are right now and where they want to be. After all, dreams are a definitive part of life, that dictate where you will be next.

If you have experienced these feelings, or share this way of thinking, then make sure to give Little Room a try. You will not regret it.

Quick Note: Little Room was developed in a little over a week as an experimental little project. It might feel a little rushed, but the message is sent across regardless. So, enjoy it~

Special Thanks

Once again, thank you to everyone for your continued support, to all that enjoy my work and to those that will enjoy it next. It really means alot to get that kind of attention, as small as that is.
